name: Clear quartz
desc: a clear crystal considered a master healer and believed to support the entire energetic system

name: Jasper
desc: a nurturing stone said to provide support during times of stress

name: Obsidian
desc: believed to help process emotions and experiences and aid in letting go

name: Amethyst
desc: used for healing, purifying, and enhancing willpower

name: Bloodstone
desc: said to improve circulation and provide support to blood-related issues

name: Tiger's eye
desc: said to provide motivation and lessen fear

name: Citrine
desc: believed to spark enthusiasm, creativity, and concentration

name: Turquoise
desc: thought to soothe emotions and attract good luck

name: Sapphire
desc: known as a stone of prosperity

name: Jade
desc: well-known stone for prosperity and luck

name: Rose quartz
desc: sometimes referred to as the stone of love and believed to encourage love and trust

name: Moonstone
desc: said to prompt feelings of inner strength and growth

name: Ruby
desc: believed to support sexuality and sensuality
